import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import productData from '../../data/ProductData'; import './ProductDetail.css'; function ProductDetail() { const { productId } = useParams(); const product = productData.find(p => p.id === parseInt(productId)); if (!product) { return
Product not found
; } const relatedProducts = product.relatedItems ? product.relatedItems.map(id => productData.find(p => p.id === id)) : []; return (
Home / Gaming /

{product.name}

{product.name}

{product.reviews}

{product.stockStatus}

${product.price}

{product.description}

Colors:

{product.delivery}
{product.postalCode}
{product.return}

{product.returnPolicy}Details
); } export default ProductDetail;
